import {useState} from 'react' const defaultFormFields = [ displayName = '', email = '', passwprd = '', confirmPassword = '', ] const SignUpForm = (defaultFormFields) => { //把整个表单的data作为一个整体写在一个state里面，就不需要写好几个useState，setState const [formFields,setFormFields] = useState(defaultFormFields) const {displayName,email,passwprd,confirmPassword} = formFields const handleChange = (event) => { const {name,value} = event.target setFormFields({...formFields,[name]:value}) //展开数组formFields,并且更改里面某个key的值 } return (

Sign up with your email and password

) } export default SignUpForm
